name: User input flows into Logger
description: Values from user-controlled source may eventually flow into a logger sink

name: Sensitive data flows into Logger
description: Values from a sensitive data source may eventually flow into a logger sink

name: User input flows into Demo
description: Values from user-controlled source may eventually flow into sink Demo

name: User input flows into network request
description: Values from user-controlled source may eventually flow into sink network request

name: User input flows into code execution (RCE)
description: Values from user-controlled source may eventually flow into code execution

name: Sensitive data flows into network request
description: Values from a sensitive data source may eventually flow into network request

name: User input flows into Array allocation (DoS)
description: Values from user-controlled source may eventually flow into array allocation

name: User input flows into file resolver
description: Values from user-controlled source may eventually flow into sink file resolver

name: User input flows into Snaptu Screen controller
description: Values from user-controlled source may eventually flow into Snaptu Screen controller
